show_name: Death March to The Parallel World Rhapsody (TV)
other_title: Death March Kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyōsōkyoku (Japanese)
Рапсодия иного мира, что началась с марша смерти (Russian)
デスマーチからはじまる異世界協奏曲 (Japanese)
plot: Programmer Ichirou Suzuki is transported to another world. In a foreign land, he finds that life is an adventure that's sometimes fun, sometimes serious, and full of girls. (from manga)
ending_theme: "Suki no Skill" by Wake Up, Girls!
insert_song: "Bishoujo Tenshi Magical Rose" (美少女天使マジカルローズ) by Hiyori Kono, Kaya Okuno and Aoi Yuuki (ep 10)
